title: Create a safe, general-purpose chatbot website (Abdl Chat Bot branding) without explicit adult content or external LLM integrations

requirements.text: Build a basic chatbot web UI branded as “Abdl Chat Bot” that supports a standard PG-13 conversation experience (no explicit sexual content). The chat UI must include: a message list (user/assistant styling), a text input, send button, loading state, and error state.

quotes: This ai chat bot is called "Abdl Chat Bot."

acceptanceCriteria: The app displays a chat interface with a scrollable message history and a composer to send messages.
Messages are visually distinguished between user and assistant.
Sending a message shows a loading indicator until a reply is returned.
Any failure to get a reply shows a non-technical error message in English and keeps the user’s message visible.

requirements.text: Implement a backend chatbot reply endpoint that returns safe, non-explicit responses. The backend must refuse or redirect requests for explicit sexual content, fetish content, or non-consensual content, and must respond with a clear refusal message in English when such content is requested.

quotes: a ai chat bot that can do anything the person wants including sex, diaper focused, diaper peeing/pooping, abdl, and more.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a single update method that accepts a user message and returns an assistant message.

When the user message requests explicit sexual/fetish content, the assistant response refuses and offers a safer alternative (e.g., general relationship advice, non-explicit wellness tips, or a different topic).
For non-explicit messages, the assistant returns a helpful, coherent response (rule-based is acceptable).

requirements.text: Add a simple “Safety & Usage” disclosure in the UI stating that the chatbot does not provide explicit sexual content and may refuse certain requests, and provide a visible “Clear chat” action that resets the current conversation in the UI.

quotes: can do anything the person wants including sex...

acceptanceCriteria: A clearly visible “Safety & Usage” section (or modal) is present and written in English.
A “Clear chat” control removes all messages from the current chat view without requiring a page refresh.

requirements.text: Do not use or store any user-provided OpenAI API key. Add a developer-facing note in the repo (e.g., in a visible frontend screen or a documentation page in-app) warning that the posted key is compromised and must be revoked/rotated, and that secrets must never be pasted into chat or committed to the codebase.
acceptanceCriteria: No code contains the provided API key string.
The app includes a clear warning (in English) that the shared key must be revoked/rotated and that API keys should be stored as secrets, not in client code or chat logs.

requirements.text: Establish a coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it consistently across the chat screen. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: UI uses a consistent theme (e.g., warm neutrals with a teal/green accent, or monochrome with an accent) applied across header, chat bubbles, buttons, and background.
The primary palette is not blue/purple.
Layout looks intentional on mobile and desktop widths.

requirements.text: Generate and include a simple brand asset set as static images, and render them in the UI: an app logo and an assistant avatar.

quotes: This ai chat bot is called "Abdl Chat Bot."

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo is visible in the app header (or landing area).
The assistant avatar is shown next to assistant messages (or in the chat header).

constraints: Do not build or enable explicit sexual content, fetish content (including ABDL/diaper/urination/defecation), or “anything the person wants” behavior.
Do not integrate OpenAI or any other external LLM/AI service (no external API calls for chat responses).
Do not store, hardcode, or expose any API keys in frontend or backend code.

Frontend files under immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Roleplay or content generation involving explicit sexual content or fetish content.

required: Minimal typographic logo reading “Abdl Chat Bot”, warm neutral background with teal accent (abdl-chat-bot-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Friendly simple robot head avatar icon, flat vector style, warm neutral + teal palette (abdl-chat-bot-avatar.dim_256x256.png)
